page.title: 13CHILDREN IN STAMBOURNE
page.content: The only organisations exclusively for children and young people are the Sunday School and the Lions football club. Children and young people are members of the Stambourne Players, the Women's Institute and the dog club. Children travel for other activities: Brownie Guides in Toppesfield and Guides in Yeldham, Cubs, Scouts and Venture Scouts in Ridgewell or Finchingfield. Teenagers attend Youth Clubs in Finchingfield and Haverhill. Hedingham Junior Music School provides music tuition and school pupils take part in after- school activities eg drama and music productions and sport. There is no public transport to take them to any of these activities, so parents have to transport their children by car. Car-sharing is extensive.
